data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
GoogleWhack is a game. The idea of the game is to generate a page
    on google that reports only one result by entering a query with two
    words (quotes may not surround the words). There are three rules:

    - Must generate one, and only one result on google, ie Results 1 -
    1 of 1 - Both words must exist in dictionary.com - The resulting
    page must not be a list of words

    For more information, visit:

    http://zdnet.com.com/2100-1106-826128.html
    http://www.googlewhack.com/

    This module finds, verifies, and/or submits GoogleWhacks.
